Shabad OS B.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor
The Lord is the emperor of the emperors, the truth and the beautiful
He, the great, is nonchalant and his mystery cannot be understood
His court is also anxiety free.
The feats of His powers are unfathomable and impervious.
His praise is true and the story of His eulogisation is undescribable.
I accept the true Guru wondrous and offer my life (for His truth).
Grandeur of the Primeval Lord
Millions of Brahmas, Visnus and Mahegas adore the Lord.
Narad, Saran and Sesanag eulogise Him.
The gams, gandharvas and Gana et al. play instruments (for Him).

lines.gurmukhi: iCA drsn kir vys swNg bxwiedy
lines.transliteration_english: Chhia Darasan Kari Vays Saang Banaaiday.

Shabad OS B.translation: The six philosophies also propound different garbs (for reaching Him).
The gurus sermonize the disciples and the disciples act accordingly.

lines.gurmukhi: Awid purKu Awdysu pwr n pwiedy ]2]
lines.transliteration_english: Aadi Purakhu Aadaysu Paaru N Paaiday ?2?

Shabad OS B.translation: Salute to the primeval Lord who is unfathomable.
Grandeur of the Primeval Lord
The pirs and paigambars (messengers of Lord) worship Him.
The shaikhs and many other worshippers remain in His shelter.

lines.gurmukhi: gaus kuqb keI loie dr bKsMdgI
lines.transliteration_english: Gaous Koutab Kaee Loi Dar Bakhasandagee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The gaues and qutabs (spiritualists of Islam) of many places beg for His grace at His door.
Dervishs in their trance stand at His gate to receive (alms from Him)

lines.gurmukhi: vlI aulh suix soie krin psMdgI

Shabad OS B.translation: Listening to the praises of that Lord many walls also love Him.
A rare person of high fortune reaches His court.
People know not the works of  creator
People go on explaining disconnected rumours
But none of the Hindus and Muslims has identified the truth.
Only an humble person is accepted respectfully in the court of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: vyd kqyb kurwxu n AKru jwixAw
lines.transliteration_english: Vayd Katayb Kuraanu N Akhar Jaaniaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Vedas, katebas and the 'Qur'an (i.e. all the scriptures of world) also know not even a single word about Him.
The whole world is wonder-struck to see his wondrous deeds.
I am sacrifice unto that creator who Himself is the basic grandeur of His creation.

lines.gurmukhi: 5 rswN dy pRXwry mhl qoN dUr hn

Shabad OS B.translation: Pleasure seekers are away from His abode

lines.gurmukhi: lK lK rUp srUp AnUp isDwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Lakh Roop Saroop Anoop Sidhaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of beauteous persons come to and go from this world
Millions of beauteous persons come to and go from this world and perform variegated activities.

lines.gurmukhi: rwg nwd ivsmwd gux iniD gwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Raag Naad Visamaad Goun Nidhi Gaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The rags (melodies) and nods (sounds) also being wonder-struck eulogise that ocean of attributes (the Lord).

lines.gurmukhi: rs ks lK suAwd ciK cKwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Ras Kas Lakh Suaad Chakhi Chakhaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions taste and make others taste the edibles and inedibles.
Crores of people manage to make others enjoy the fragrance and varied smells.

lines.gurmukhi: gYr mhil sulqwn mhl n pwvhI ]5]
lines.transliteration_english: Gair Mahali Sulataan Mahalu N Paavahee ?5?

Shabad OS B.translation: But those who consider the Lord of this (body) mansion as an alien, they all cannot attain His mansion.
Duality and unity

lines.gurmukhi: isv skqI dw mylu duibDw hoveI
lines.transliteration_english: Siv Sakatee Daa Maylu Doubidhaa Hovaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The confluence of Siva and the Sakti is the root cause of this creation full of duality.

lines.gurmukhi: qRYgux mwieAw Kylu Bir Bir DoveI
lines.transliteration_english: Trai Goun Maaiaa Khaylu Bhari Bhari Dhovaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The maya with her three gunas (qualities – rajas, tamas and salty) plays her games and sometimes fills the man (with hopes and desires) and at another time empties him totally frustrating his plans.
Maya deludes people through the cyclic garlands of dharma, arth, cam and mokc (four supposed ideals of life) offered by her to man.
But man, the sum total of five elements, perishes ultimately.

lines.gurmukhi: iCA ruiq bwrh mwh his his roveI
lines.transliteration_english: Chhia Routi Baarah Maah Hasi Hasi Rovaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The jiv (creature), laughs, weeps and wails during all the six seasons and twelve months of his life

lines.gurmukhi: iriD isiD nv iniD nId n soveI ]6]
lines.transliteration_english: Ridhi Sidhi Navanidhi Need N Sovaee ?6?

Shabad OS B.translation: And imbued with the pleasures of the miraculous powers (given him by the Lord) never attains peace and equipoise.

lines.gurmukhi: 7 Bwau Bgiq qoN ibnwN Pokt hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Everything futile without loving devotion

lines.gurmukhi: shs isAwxp lK kMim n AwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Sahaj Siaanap Lakh Kanmi N Aavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of skills make no avail.

lines.gurmukhi: igAwn iDAwn aunmwnu AMqu n pwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Giaan Dhiaan Ounamaanu Antu N Paavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Myriads of knowledges, concentrations and inferences are unable to know the mysteries of Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: lK ssIAr lK Bwnu Aihinis DRXwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Saseear Lakh Bhaanu Ahinisi Dhayaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of moons and suns adore Him day and night.
And millions of people remain imbued with humility.

lines.gurmukhi: lK lK grb gumwn lj ljwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Lakh Garab Goumaan Laj Lajaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions are worshipping the Lord according to their own religious traditions.

lines.gurmukhi: lK lK dIn eImwn qwVI lwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Lakh Deen Eemaan Taarhee Laavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions are worshipping the Lord according to their own religious traditions.
Only through loving devotion one can merge in the Lord, the absolute truth.
With loving devotion, all is futile
Millions of spiritualists and emperors confuse the public.

lines.gurmukhi: jog Bog lK rwh sMig clwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Jog Bhog Lakh Raah Sangi Chalaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions adopt yoga and bhog (enjoyment) simultaneously

lines.gurmukhi: dIn dunI Asgwh hwQ n pwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Deen Dounee Asagaah Haadi N Paavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: But they cannot fathom the divine who is beyond all the religions and the world.
Myriads of servants serve him

lines.gurmukhi: AMqu n isPiq slwh AwiK suxwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Antu N Sidhati Salaah Aakhi Sounaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: But their praises and eulogies cannot know his extent.
All standing at His court adore that anxiety-free Lord.
With loving devotion, all is futile
Many masters and leaders come and go.
Many majestic courts exist and their stores are so full of wealth
That continuous counting goes on there (to avoid any deficiency).
Many becoming helping hand to many families are sticking to their words and protect their reputation.
Many, controlled by greed, infatuation and ego, go on swindling and cheating.

lines.transliteration_english: Karaday Chaaru Veechaari Dah Disi Dhaavanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are there who talking and discoursing sweetly wander in all the ten directions.
Millions are old people who are still swinging their mind in the hopes and desires.

lines.gurmukhi: 10 Bwau Bgiq qoN Cu`t hor prcy

Shabad OS B.translation: Without loving devotion all else is is futile

lines.gurmukhi: lK dwqy dwqwr mMig mMig dyvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Daatay Daataar Mangi Mangi Dayvahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions are the generous persons who beg and bestow upon others.
Millions are incarnations (of gods) who having born have performed many acts
Many boatmen have rowed but none could know the extent and end of the world ocean.
The thinkers also could know nothing about His mystery.
The thinkers also could know nothing about His mystery.
Millions are eating and feeding others and
Millions are there who are serving the transcendental Lord and also in the courts of worldly kings.

lines.gurmukhi: 11 Bwau Bgiq qoN Cu`t hor prcy

Shabad OS B.translation: Nothing without loving devotion
The valiant soldiers show their powers

lines.gurmukhi: suix suix surqy lK AwiK suxwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Souni Souni Suratay Lakh Aakhi Sounaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of the listeners explain His praises.

lines.transliteration_english: Khojee Khojani Khoji Dahi Disi Dhaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Researchers also run in all the ten directions.

lines.gurmukhi: icr jIvY lK hoie n EVku pwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Chir Jeevai Lakh Hoi N Aorhaku Paavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of long-lived ones have happened but none could know the mystery of that Lord

lines.gurmukhi: Kry isAwxy hoie n mnu smJwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Kharay Siaanay Hoi N Manu Samajhaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Even being clever, people do not make their minds understand (the futility of rituals and other allied hypocrisies)
And ultimately get punished at the court of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: 12 KudI dy du`K sbr dy suK

Shabad OS B.translation: Sufferings of ego and delights of contentment
Physicians prepare myriads of prescriptions.
Millions of people full of wisdom adopt many a resolution.
Many enemies unwittingly go on increasing their enmity.

lines.gurmukhi: liV liV krin muhIm Awpu gxwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Larhi Larhi Karani Muheem Aapu Ganaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: They march for fightings and thus show their ego

lines.gurmukhi: hoie jdId kdIm n KudI imtwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Hoi Jadeed Kadeem N Khudee Mitaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: From youth, though, they step in old age yet their egotism is not effaced.
Only the contented and the humble lose their sense of egocentricity.
Negation of self conceit is the salvation

lines.gurmukhi: lK lK pIr murId myl imlwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Lakh Peer Mureed Mayl Milaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lacs of spiritualists and their disciples assemble.
Myriads of beggers ave pilgrimages at the martyries.

lines.gurmukhi: lK rojy lK eId invwj krwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Rojay Lakh Eed Nivaaj Karaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of people observe fasts (roza) and offer namaz (prayer) of id.

lines.gurmukhi: kir kir guPq sunId mn prcwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Kari Kari Gudhat Souneed Man Parachaavahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many entice their minds by being busy in questioning and answering.
Many are engaged in preparing the key of evotion for opening the lock of mind's temple.

lines.gurmukhi: dir drvys rsId n Awpu jxwvhI ]13]
lines.transliteration_english: Dari Daravays Raseed N Aapu Janaavahee ?13?

Shabad OS B.translation: But those Who by becoming dervish at the door of Lord have become acceptable, never show their individuality.
Ugly are the people indulged in delusion
Tall palaces are erected and carpets are spread therein,
To get counted amongst, the high-ups.

lines.gurmukhi: kir gV kot hjwr rwj kmwvxy
lines.transliteration_english: Kari Garh Kot Hajaar Raaj Kamaavanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Constructing thousands of forts people rule over them
And millions of officers sing panegyrics in the honour of their rulers.
Such people full of their self-esteems go on transmigrating from
And to this world and look uglier in the true court of the Lord.
Hypocrisy does not avail there
Millions of bathings at pilgrimage centres on auspicious occasions;
Serving at the places of gods and goddesses;

lines.gurmukhi: jp qp sMjm lK swiD sDwvxw
lines.transliteration_english: Jap Tap Sanjam Lakh Saadhi Sadhaavanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Observance of austerities and millions of praxis by being meditative and full of continence
Offerings through yajn and horns etc;

lines.gurmukhi: vrq nym lK dwn krm kmwvxw
lines.transliteration_english: Varat Naym Lakh Daan Karam Kamaavanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Fasts, dos and donots and millions of charities (for the sake of show business)
Have absolutely no meaning in that true court of the Lord.
Man of the Lord's court is the highest
Millions of leather bags (boats) go on floating on water

lines.gurmukhi: EVk EVk Bwil suiD n lhMdIAw
lines.transliteration_english: Aorhak Aorhak Bhaali Sudhi N Lahandeeaan.

Shabad OS B.translation: But even searching the vast ocean they do not find possible to know the ends of the ocean.

lines.gurmukhi: Anl mnl kir iKAwl aumig aufMdIAwN
lines.transliteration_english: Anal Manal Kari Khiaal Oumagi Udandeeaan.

Shabad OS B.translation: The lines of anil birds fly high to know about the sky but their jumps and

lines.gurmukhi: auCil krin auCwl n auiB cVHMdIAw
lines.transliteration_english: Ouchhali Karani Ouchhaal N Oubhi Charhhandeeaan.

Shabad OS B.translation: Upward flights do not take them to the highest borders of sky.
Millions of skies and nether worlds (and their inhabitants) are beggars before Him and
Before the servants of God's court are nothing more than a particle of dust.
Creation of the wondrous Lord Vahiguru

lines.gurmukhi: qRRY gux mwieAw Kylu kir dyKwilAw
lines.transliteration_english: Trai Goun Maaiaa Khaylu Kari Daykhaaliaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Lord has produced this world as the play of the three dimensional maya.
He has accomplished the feat of (the creation of) four life mines (egg, foetus, sweat, vegetation) and four speeches (pars, pasyanti, madhyama and vaikhar).
Creating from the five elements he bound them all in a divine law.

lines.gurmukhi: iCA ruiq bwrh mwh isrij smHwilAw
lines.transliteration_english: Chhia Routi Baarah Maah Siraji Samhaaliaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He created and sustained the six seasons and the twelve months.
For day and night He lit the sun and the moon as lamps.
With one vibrational throb he expanded the whole creation and delighted it through his graceful glance.
He is detached
With one word (sound) the Lord creates the universe and destroyes it.

lines.gurmukhi: iqdUM lK drIAwau n EVku jwpdw
lines.transliteration_english: Tidoo Lakh Dareeaau N Aorhaku Jaapadaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: From that very Lord myriads of life streams have emerged and there is no end to them.

lines.gurmukhi: lK bHmMf smwau n lhir ivAwpdw
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Brahamand Samaau N Lahari Viaapadaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of universes subsume in Him but He is uninfluenced by any of them.

lines.gurmukhi: kir kir vyKY cwau lK prqwpdw
lines.transliteration_english: Kari Kari Vaykhai Chaau Lakh Parataapadaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He sees His own activities with great enthusiasm and makes many a man glorious

lines.gurmukhi: kaux krY ArQwau vr n srwp dw
lines.transliteration_english: Kaounu Karai Aradaau Var N Saraap Daa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Who can decode the mystery and meaning of the principle of His boons and curses?

lines.gurmukhi: lhY n pCoqwau puMn n pwp dw ]18]
lines.transliteration_english: Lahai N Pachhotaau Pounnu N Paap Daa ?18?

Shabad OS B.translation: He accepts not only the (mental) repentance of sins and virtues (and accepts the good deeds).

lines.gurmukhi: 19 kudrq qy kwdr byAMq Asgwh hY

Shabad OS B.translation: The creator and His creation are infinite

lines.gurmukhi: kudriq Agmu AQwhu AMqu n pweIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Kudarati Agamu Adaahu Antu N Paaeeai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Creation, the power of the Lord is unrpproachable and unfathomable.
Nobody can know its extent. That creator is without any anxiety;how could He be persuaded and amused.
How the majesty of His court could be described.

lines.gurmukhi: koie n dsY rwhu ikqu ibiD jweIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Koi N Dasai Raahu Kitu Bidhi Jaaeeai.

Shabad OS B.translation: None is there to tell the way and means leading to Him.

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu isPiq slwh ikau kir iDAweIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Sidhati Salaah Kiu Kari Dhiaaeeai.

Shabad OS B.translation: This is also incomprehensible that how infinite are his eulogies and how should He be concentrated upon.

lines.gurmukhi: Aibgiq giq Asgwhu n AlKu lKweIAY ]19]
lines.transliteration_english: Abigati Gati Asagaahu N Alakhu Lakhaaeeai ?19?

Shabad OS B.translation: The dynamics of the Lord is unmanifest, deep and unfathomable; it cannot be known.
Only grace of the lord desired
The primeval Lord is said to be the supreme wonder.

lines.gurmukhi: Awid AnIlu Anwid sbdu n swKIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Aadi Aneelu Anaadi Sabadu N Saakheeai.

Shabad OS B.translation: The words also fail to tell about the beginning of that beginningless.

lines.gurmukhi: vrqY Awid jugwid n glI gwKIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Varatai Aadi Jougaadi N Galee Gaakheeai.

Shabad OS B.translation: He operates in the time and even before the time primordial and mere discussions cannot explain Him.
He, the protector and lover of the devotees is undeceivable known by the name of the equipoise.
The desire of the consciousness is to remain merged in His unstruck melody heard in the trance.
He, being full of all dimensions, is the wonder of the wonders.
Now the only desire remains that the grace of the perfect Guru be with me (so that I may realise the Lord).

lines.gurmukhi: isD nwQ jogI jog iDAwn mY n Awn sky byd pwT kir bHmwidk n jwny hY
lines.transliteration_english: Sidh Naad Jogee Jog Dhiaan Mai N Aan Sakay , Bayd Paatth Kari Brahamaadik N Jaanay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The Supreme, absolute, true Lord whom Sidhs, Yogis and Naths could not bring in their perception, who could not be known by Brahma and other deities despite contemplation of Vedas;

lines.gurmukhi: AiDAwqm igAwn kY n isv snkwid pwey jog Bog mY n ieMdRwidk pihcwny hY
lines.transliteration_english: Adhiaatam Giaan Kai N Siv Sanakaadi Paaay , Jog Bhog Mai N Indraadik Pahichaanay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The Lord who could not be realised by Shiva and four sons of Brahma, nor by Indra and other such deities who resorted myriad yags and penances;

lines.gurmukhi: nwm ismrn kY syKwidk n sMK jwnI bHmcrj nwrdwdk ihrwny hY
lines.transliteration_english: Naam Simaran Kai Saykhaadik N Sankh Jaanee , Brahamacharaj Naaradaadak Hiraanay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Whom Shesh Naag with his thousand tongues could not comprehend and speak out all names of the Lord; bewildered by His magnificence, even the celibate sage Narad gave up the search out of frustration,

lines.gurmukhi: nwnw Avqwr kY Apwr ko n pwr pwieE pUrn bHm gurisK mn mwny hY ]21]
lines.transliteration_english: Naanaa Avataar Kai Apaar Ko N Paar Paaiao , Pooran Braham Gursikh Man Maanay Hai ?21?

Shabad OS B.translation: About the infinitude of which Lord, Vishnu in spite of manifesting in so many incarnations, could know nothing. Satguru manifests Him in the heart of his obedient devotee. (21)
